entry.title: WIND WARNING , Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:45 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 06:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 11.4°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: 7.5°C
Wind: SSW 10 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 then light near noon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
